member.name: P:Telerik.Sitefinity.EverliveConnector.EverliveConnectorResources.EverliveReasonDescriptionLabel2
member.summary: Phrase: To maximize mobile app performance, Telerik Backend Services use a non-relational database built for speed and scalability. RESTful web services result in less traffic and in lightning speed of mobile apps.

member.name: P:Telerik.Sitefinity.EverliveConnector.EverliveConnectorResources.EverliveReasonDescriptionLabel3
